example: Stay tuned for the next update.
tr: Bir sonraki güncelleme için takipte kal.

example: Let’s take a break after this task.
tr: Bu işten sonra bir mola verelim.

example: Can you take care of the guests?
Take notes on the main points.
He should take responsibility for his actions.
We met the other day at the cafe.
We need to think ahead about risks.
What do you think of this idea?
To be honest, I didn’t like it much.
tr: Dürüst olmak gerekirse pek hoşuma gitmedi.

example: The situation is under control now.
Dinner choice is up to you.
Things will work out in the end.
All the effort was worth it.
Take an umbrella; you never know.
tr: Şemsiye al; ne olur ne olmaz.
